type.name: org.gradle.api.specs.Specs
type.description: * Provides a number of {@link org.gradle.api.specs.Spec} implementations.

method.name: intersect
method.description: * Returns a spec that selects the intersection of those items selected by the given specs. Returns a spec that selects everything when no specs provided.

method.name: intersect
method.description: * Returns a spec that selects the intersection of those items selected by the given specs. Returns a spec that selects everything when no specs provided.

method.name: negate
method.description: * Returns a spec that selects everything that is not selected by the given spec.

method.name: union
method.description: * Returns a spec that selects the union of those items selected by the provided spec. Selects everything when no specs provided.

method.name: union
method.description: * Returns a spec that selects the union of those items selected by the provided spec. Selects everything when no specs provided.
